title: SPICED APPLE QUICK BREAD
directions: In a large mixing bowl, combine butter or shortening, sugar and eggs; beat well. Stir in grated apple and half the dry ingredients. Add wet ingredients and stir until mixed.
Add remaining ingredients and mix to combine well (about 20 seconds - do not overmix or it will become tough).
Bake in a buttered 9x5x3-inch loaf pan at 350Â°F for 55 to 60 minutes, or until a wooden toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean.
Remove from pan and cool on wire rack for at least 20 minutes before slicing. Wrap tightly and store in a cool place.
ingredients: 2 cups minus 2 tbsp. all purpose flour
1/2 cup melted butter or vegetable shortening
1/4 cut buttermilk, yogurt or sour cream
3/4 cup brown sugar (packed into measuring cup)
1 cup coarsely grated, cored and peeled raw apples
1/2 cup rolled wheat or oats or old-fashioned oatmeal
2 tbsp. wheat germ, wheat bran or oat bran (optional)
